getMediationAdapterClassName().Description: Returns the mediation adapter class name. In the case of a mediated ad response, this is the name of the class that was responsible for performing the ad request and rendering the ad. For non-mediated responses, this value will be null.

ClassDesc: The @B_android#view#View_E@ to display banner ads. The ad size and ad unit ID must be set prior to calling @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdView#loadAd_E@. Publishers using DoubleClick for Publishers or Search Ads for Apps should use @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#doubleclick#PublisherAdView_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdView_E@, respectively.
